channel.title: TriviaBot 718 help!
channel.description:
Hey guys, a few things i need a little help on, I've been wanting to make a little project off Matrix Base but Idk what's up with the Compiler in the source, There are Class errors and TriviaBot errors, I've looked in TriviaBot and found nothing, here's the error: [code]src\com\rs\game\player\content\TriviaBot.java:1: error: illegal character: \187 ∩╗┐package com.rs.game.player.content; ^ src\com\rs\game\player\content\TriviaBot.java:1: error: illegal character: \191 ∩╗┐package com.rs.game.player.content; ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
also, I'd like to know where cache files are, like for editing sprites etc as I can't find them :S or know the name in my C: drive if they are in there.
Sorry if i sound like a noob :L Just came back from 4years of not coding RSPS's and to a new generation of RSPS's :L

item.title: TriviaBot 718 help!
item.dc:creator: @Haydnz1234 Haydnz1234
item.description:
@Haydnz1234 wrote:

use eclipse? What will it do?

EDIT: Add my skype: Haydnz1234 (Skype Name)

EDIT: Idk how to use Eclipse I tried and sent you a PM, i just get that boolean message…

Read full topic

item.title: TriviaBot 718 help!
item.dc:creator: @zingerman111 zingerman111
item.description:
@zingerman111 wrote:

thats not an error

use eclipse

Read full topic
